item.title: Extending Ethernet over MPLS Networks
item.description:

item.title: What is VPLS Bringing to MPLS Networks?
item.description:
Businesses with numerous branches have embraced MPLS networks for their affordability and high performance in connecting multiple locations. However, they may be overlooking a superior connectivity solution: Virtual Private LAN Service (VPLS). Essentially, VPLS is an Ethernet transport service operating over existing MPLS networks, enhancing rather than replacing them. What sets VPLS apart is its ability to unify all your individual LANs into a single, company-wide network.
